attributes.action: put pressure on Sony to stop them overcharging the UK for its Playstation 3 console.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We in the UK believe that the price we will be paying for the PS3 is too high.

The Chinese are paying 3,780 Hong Kong dollars which is just £255.

The Japaneses are paying 59,980 yen which is £267.

The Americans are paying 599 USD which is £314.

Most of Europe will be paying 599 Euro which is £403.

In the United Kingdom we will be paying £425

If this isn't bad enough, the European Playstation 3 is less functional than Playstation 3's sold elsewhere. PS3's from the rest of the world contain hardware for backwards compatability but to cut costs Sony has removed this from the European models in favour of a less functional software equivalent.

We are being ripped off and this isnt fair.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
